name: XPathExpression.evaluate
description: The evaluate() method of the XPathExpression interface executes an XPath expression on the given node or document and returns an XPathResult.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 XPath Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'XPathExpression.evaluate()' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 XPath Specification' specification.
